import React, { useState } from 'react' import * as busApi from '../api/bus-search' const SearchBus = () => { const [searchResult, setSearchReasult] = useState([]) const [travelPlan, setTravelPlan] = useState({}) const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() busApi.busSearch(travelPlan) .then(response => response.data) } const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { const fieldValue = e.target.value setTravelPlan({ ...travelPlan, [field]: fieldValue }) console.log(travelPlan) } return (

handleChangeEvent(e, 'from')} className="form-control " placeholder="From" />

handleChangeEvent(e,'trvDate')} className="form-control" placeholder="Travel Date"/>

) } export default SearchBus;
